verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Silvanus <S%G4610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Of Thessalonians <S%G2331><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

To Thank <S%G2168><s%> We Ought <S%G3784><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Meet <S%G514><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Increases Exceedingly <S%G5232><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Abounds <S%G4121><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of One <S%G1520><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> One Another; <S%G240><s%>

So As For <S%G5620><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Ourselves <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> To Boast <S%G2744><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5281><s%> Your Endurance <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1375><s%> Your Persecutions <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tribulations <S%G2347><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Are Bearing; <S%G430><s%>

A Manifest Token <S%G1730><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Accounted Worthy <S%G2661><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Suffer; <S%G3958><s%>

If At Least <S%G1512><s%> Righteous It Is <S%G1342><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Recompense <S%G467><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Oppress <S%G2346><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Tribulation, <S%G2347><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Are Oppressed <S%G2346><s%> Repose <S%G425><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Revelation <S%G602><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> ' With The <S%G3326><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> <S%G1411><s%> Of His Power, <S%G846><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> A Fire <S%G4442><s%> Of Flame, <S%G5395><s%> Awarding <S%G1325><s%> Vengeance <S%G1557><s%> On Those That <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Obey <S%G5219><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Who The <S%G3748><s%> Penalty <S%G1349><s%> Shall Suffer, <S%G5099><s%> Destruction <S%G3639><s%> Eternal, <S%G166><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Presence <S%G4383><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2479><s%> Of His Strength, <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> He Shall Have Come <S%G2064><s%> To Be Glorified <S%G1740><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G40><s%> His Saints <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Wondered At <S%G2296><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Them That <S%G3588><s%> Believe, <S%G4100><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Was Believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3142><s%> Our Testimony <S%G2257><s%> ' To <S%G1909><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> That Day. <S%G1565><s%>

For <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Pray <S%G4336><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> May Count Worthy <S%G515><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Calling <S%G2821><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God, <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Fulfil <S%G4137><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Good Pleasure <S%G2107><s%> Of Goodness <S%G19><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Of Faith <S%G4102><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Power, <S%G1411><s%>

So That <S%G3704><s%> May Be Glorified <S%G1740><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Of Our God <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
